医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AI 模型使用常规胸部 X 光检查来预测从不吸烟者患肺癌的风险根据下周在北美放射学会年会上公布的一项研究，人工智能 (AI) 工具可以使用常规胸部 X 光图像来识别肺癌高风险的非吸烟者。北美放射学会）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/AI-model-predicts-lung-cancer-risk-in-never-smokers-using-routine-chest-X-rays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/AI-model-predicts-lung-cancer-risk-in-never-smokers-using-routine-chest-X-rays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ac59a51-3b73-477b-a768-68de48a8fad9 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 14:28:15 -0500 AI model predicts lung cancer risk in never-smokers using routine chest X-rays
抗风湿药物可能对自身免疫性甲状腺疾病有预防作用卡罗林斯卡医学院研究人员在《内科医学杂志》上发表的一项新观察性研究表明，用于治疗类风湿性关节炎的抗风湿药物可能会预防自身免疫性甲状腺疾病的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Anti-rheumatic-drugs-could-have-a-preventive-effect-on-autoimmune-甲状腺-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Anti-rheumatic-drugs-could-have-a-preventive-effect-on-autoimmune-甲状腺-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57238034-7591-4960-9314-ffdc37926516 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 14:24:05 -0500 Anti-rheumatic drugs could have a preventive effect on autoimmune thyroid disease
理解和治疗自闭症谱系障碍的新理论框架本研究通过引入刚性自主相序（RAPS）形成概念，深入研究自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）的行为复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/A-novel-theoretical-framework-for-understanding-and-treating-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/A-novel-theoretical-framework-for-understanding-and-treating-autism-spectrum-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f1afca9-23bf-4200-ad9e-191d509405f5 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 14:17:56 -0500 A novel theoretical framework for understanding and treating autism spectrum disorder

研究人员发现印迹细胞的记忆存储机制让我们的大脑吸收有关世界的新信息并形成记忆的机制是什么？都柏林三一学院的 Tomás Ryan 博士领导的神经科学家团队的新研究表明，学习是通过大脑不同区域的特定印迹细胞之间不断形成新的连接模式而发生的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Researchers-discover-mechanism-for-memory-storage-in-engram-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Researchers-discover-mechanism-for-memory-storage-in-engram-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b157a239-3424-4857-a362-121cf2a1a196 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 08:34:49 -0500 Researchers discover mechanism for memory storage in engram cells
